heroes.name: npc_dota_hero_mirana
heroes.bio_loc: Born to a royal family, a blood princess next in line for the Solar Throne, Mirana willingly surrendered any claim to mundane land or titles when she dedicated herself completely to the service of Selemene, Goddess of the Moon. Known ever since as Princess of the Moon, Mirana prowls the sacred Nightsilver Woods searching for any who would dare poach the sacred luminous lotus from the silvery pools of the Goddess's preserve. Riding on her enormous feline familiar, she is poised, proud and fearless, attuned to the phases of the moon and the wheeling of the greater constellations. Her bow, tipped with sharp shards of lunar ore, draws on the moon's power to charge its arrows of light.
heroes.hype_loc: As she takes aim from a distance with her deadly arrow, Mirana must always be ready to leap into battle. Able to shield her allies from the eyes of her enemies, she ensures that her team is always on the prowl.
heroes.npe_desc_loc: Stuns enemies with precise arrows from afar

facets.description_loc: Mirana's Ultimate grants allies invisiblity and movement speed.
facets.name: mirana_moonlight

facets.description_loc: Mirana's Ultimate grants allies increasing attack speed and damage over time.
facets.name: mirana_sunlight

abilities.name: mirana_starfall
abilities.desc_loc: Calls down a wave of meteors to damage nearby enemy units. The closest enemy unit to Mirana in a %starfall_secondary_radius% radius will be struck a second time for %secondary_starfall_damage_percent%%% of the damage.
abilities.lore_loc: The Goddess breaks the strata to empower her Princess in the time of need.
notes_loc: Starstorm is not blocked by Linken's Sphere.
Starstorm will choose a new target for the second star if the first died before impact.

abilities.name: mirana_arrow
abilities.desc_loc: Fires a long-range arrow with deadly precision, which stuns and damages the first enemy unit it strikes. The stun duration ranges from %arrow_min_stun% to %arrow_max_stun% seconds, with bonus damage up to %arrow_bonus_damage% added, based on the distance the arrow travels to its target. Instantly kills the first non-ancient creep it hits.
abilities.lore_loc: Lunar energies make the Princess of the Moon's arrows more deadly than most.
notes_loc: For every 150 distance the arrow travels, the stun duration upon impact increases by 0.5 seconds, and the bonus damage added increases by 14.
Sacred Arrow can hit invisible units.
abilities.scepter_loc: Causes Sacred Arrow to release a Starstorm on enemies along the travel path of the primary arrow, releasing a second Starstorm that deals less damage to the impacted unit.

abilities.name: mirana_leap
abilities.desc_loc: Mirana leaps forward into battle, empowering herself with a ferocious roar that grants bonus attack and movement speed. Speed bonus lasts %leap_bonus_duration% seconds.
abilities.lore_loc: None can fail to recognize Mirana's iconic white beast in the heat of battle.
abilities.shard_loc:
Upon landing, launches a projectile along Sagan's leap path, dealing damage and slowing units affected and guarantees them to be hit with a secondary Starstorm if that spell is cast. Leap does not break Moonlight Shadow invisibility.

Can be put on alt-cast to choose the distance and facing direction of the jump.

Grants %shard_bonus_charges% bonus charge(s).

abilities.name: mirana_selemenes_faithful
abilities.desc_loc: Healing Lotuses are %bonus_lotus%%% more effective on Mirana and her allies.

talents.name: special_bonus_unique_mirana_5
talents.desc_loc: Evasion works at all times during the buff

talents.name: special_bonus_unique_mirana_2
talents.desc_loc: The extra arrows are launched in a cone shape, {s:bonus_extra_arrows_angle} degrees to the left and right of the original arrow, and cannot hit the same target.

abilities.name: mirana_invis
abilities.desc_loc: Turns Mirana and all allied heroes invisible and grants bonus movement speed. If a hero is revealed, invisibility will restore after the fade delay as long as Moonlight Shadow's duration has not expired.
abilities.lore_loc: Her tenure with Selemene allows Mirana to eclipse the ground, wrapping her allies in a cloak of shadows.
notes_loc: Units affected will not auto attack enemies.

abilities.name: mirana_solar_flare
abilities.desc_loc:
Gradually increases the daytime vision range, attack speed and damage of Mirana and all allied heroes, reaching maximum power after %max_damage_time%s. Daytime vision bonus increases %day_vision_multiplier%x faster than attack speed and damage.

Allies receive %ally_pct%%% of the bonus.

special_values.name: increase_rate
special_values.heading_loc: ATTACK SPEED AND DAMAGE INCREASE RATE:
